narrative.title: Littorio Division - 1941Q4
narrative.situation: Italian Armored Division (Training Formation) deployed in North Africa during 1941Q4.
narrative.objectives: ⚠️ TRAINING FORMATION - NOT OPERATIONAL. Italian armored division designed for combined-arms mobile warfare. However, in Q4 1941, division was still conducting unit training in Italy and was NOT combat-ready or deployed to theater.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Designed for mobile armored warfare (when fully equipped and trained)
Self-propelled artillery (NOT YET RECEIVED) would enable mobile fire support
